Text: {d}šul-gi nita kalag-ga lugal urim₅{ki}-ma lugal an-ub-da limmu₂-ba-ke₄ ṣi-lu-uš-{d}da-gan ensi₂ si-mu-ru-um{ki}-ma arad₂-da-ni-ir in-na-ba
